bibl.title: Semeia, Old and New.
bibl.note: Supplement to: Herbert C. Youtie, Σημεῖον in the Papyri and its Significance for Plato, Epistle 13 (360 a-b), ZPE 6 (1970) pp. 105-116 = Scriptiunculae. II (Amsterdam, 1973) 71, pp. 963-975. - Includes a new edition of P. Lond. II, 480 (p. 320).
bibl.seg: Nikolaos Gonis, Semeia, Old and New.
